Articles.Content: Is there any mod to listen to music you have on your PC?
I found this but never tried it.. ( a media player alongside ksp was good enough so far for me but the mod seems cool)
Or you can just turn the music volume down in the settings and play ur own music in the background...
Yeah but it would be kinda cool to have an ingame music player or even a KSC radio station! MOD IDEA MOD IDEA MOD IDEA
You could install this and see if it still works I used to have it installed back in the day. Kinda forgot about it until I saw your thread.
